column4: Hey guys. Wondering if anyone can help, i just installed Teamspeak 3 (im a total noob btw) but everytime i run the command sh ts3client.sh X restarts?
I donâ€™t understand why launching Teamspeak 3 would cause X to restart every time. any suggestions?
im guessing nobody knows then :P
you could run it as > sh teamspeak.sh &>textfile
im not sure i follow, i double clicked it it restarted X so i ran the file from terminal. and again it restarted X but it seemed to install fine.
so you've ran that script to install teamspeak
yes mate. downloaded it from ts website. and ran the runscript.sh (after the installer gave me a new folder) and it restarts X i run ts3client and same thing.
you could try installing it through synaptic
only teamspeak 2 is on synaptic as far as i know.
and i need ts3 as thats what the server is running im attempting to connect to.
let me heck the installer
ok what do you need me to do ? remember i litterly installed ubuntu last night. got sick of windows 7
sorry i got Disconected
i am trying to install ts3
ahh ok thank you
i've installed teamspeak just now
then what the hell have i done wrong.
do sudo ./setup.sh
how do i delete a directory that requres root priv?
you have to be carefull with that
yeah but to exract the file i can't use sudo. or it fails so first command would be sh Teamspeak3-client*.run
or am i wrong.
setup.sh isn't there
whenever i run ts3client_runscript.sh Ts3 loads but as soon as i get the gui up X restarts that is my issue. teamspeak seems to be installed as it will load it just reboots X every time i launch it.
